Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

It was presented to Your Excellency Sir Your Excellency Sir on the 20th of the current month, from which Your Excellency Lieutenant Francisco Pinto da Silva departed, who returns leading, to deliver to Your Excellency

God preserve Your Excellency General Headquarters in Bagé, December 25, 1841. To the citizen General João Antônio da Silveira, Chief of the 1st Army Corps. Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre, 1st Deputy of the General Chief of the Army General Staff
